scripts.serve: rm -rf dist && tsc --build && mkdir -p dist/config && cp src/config/*.config dist/config/ && concurrently --handle-input "cd dist && NODE_ENV=development nodemon bin/www.js" "tsc --build --watch"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --build && mkdir -p dist/config && cp src/config/*.config dist/config/
scripts.test: mkdir -p config && cp src/config/*.config config/ && NODE_ENV=development mocha --config .mocarc.json; rm -rf config
